metadata.title: On fractional order differential equations model for nonlocal epidemics

abstract.original_text: A fractional order model for nonlocal epidemics is given. Stability of fractional order equations is studied. The results are expected to be relevant to foot-and-mouth disease, SARS and avian flu. r

sentences.segment_text: A fractional order model for nonlocal epidemics is given .
Stability of fractional order equations is studied .
The results are expected to be relevant to foot-and-mouth disease , SARS and avian flu .
